title: Otherworldly
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Shortens the [[Zot clock]] by a factor of 10.||You are easily found by Zot. |- | colspan="3" | You only get 600 turns for entering a new level.
In addition, when found by Zot, you'll only gain 200 extra turns. |- | colspan="3" | ;'''Species notes:''' :Exclusive to the 0.29-[[trunk]] species [[Meteoran]], and the April Fool's 2022 species [[Mayflytaur]]. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Bad mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Bad Mutations]]
